outputs.output_descr: The project will contribute to achieving national consensus on the actions and measures that need to be undertaken to address the climate change related issues relevant for the country in regards to the EU ETS on a short and long term. This will also open a dialogues on the need for allocation of adequate financial means for realization of the agreed actions and measures.

project_descr: Bulgarian Fast Start Finance Contribution 2011  2012: Utilizing Bulgarian Experience in Monitoring, Reporting and Verification of Greenhouse Gas Emissions required for participation in the European Union Emission Trading Scheme
